titles.title: Lord Who Throughout These Forty Days
O Lord, Throughout These Forty Days

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Lord, who throughout these forty days For us didst fast and pray, Teach us with Thee to mourn our sins And close by Thee to stay.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: As Thou with Satan didst contend, And didst the vict'ry win, O give us strength in Thee to fight, In Thee to conquer sin.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: As Thou didst hunger bear, and thirst, So teach us, gracious Lord, To die to self, and chiefly live By Thy most holy Word.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: And through these days of penitence, And through Thy passiontide, Yea, evermore in life and death, Jesus, with us abide.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Abide with us, that so, this life Of suff'ring over past, An Easter of unending joy We may attain at last.
